summary: Anita is a girl who suffers from Down Syndrome and lives with her mother in the Once neighborhood in Buenos Aires. On July 18, 1994, the bombing attack on the AMIA changes her life forever.
cast: Norma Aleandro|Luis Luque|Leonor Manso|Alejandra Manzo|Peto Menahem|Mercedes Scápola|Huang Hui Shion|Mei Lan Chen|Mateo Cho|Paula Wu|Hana Li|Isidoro Tolcachir|Alfredo Castellani|Carlos Portaluppi|Nicolás Arrieta|Ángel Galeano|Laura Cymer|Nacho Galo|Germán de Silva|Roco de Grazia|Julio Arrieta|Marcela Guerty|Jorge Chester|Julián Felcman|Adolfo Ofman|Gerardo Scherman|Joaquín Wang|Lucho Kokena|Norberto Trujillo|Pablo Gelós|Pablo Medina|Leandro Quiroz|Ruben De la Torre|Andres Dietze|Karina Hidalgo|Roberto Monzo|Ignacio Laviaguerre|Jorge Gundín|Pochi Ducasse|Barbara Denise Shocron|Cali Orione|Facundo Arana|León Melñik|Susana Aldrovandi|Joan Manuel Villar Blanco|Viviana Federico|Soledad Piacenza|Viviana Salomón|Denise Tobal|Oscar Munner|Maximiliano Trento|Nicolás Balcone|Juan Ángel Ávila|Ana Doval|Gipsy Bonafina
title: Anita
